front.title: Multiple Ethernet - IPv6 mapped IPv6 address (ME6A)

abstract.t: This document specifies Multiple Ethernet - IPv6 mapped IPv6 address(ME6A) spefification. ME6A is an Ethernet-mapped IPv6 address with a plane ID. Unique allocation of plane id value enables duplicated MAC address unique in IPv6 address space. This address may use Ethernet over IPv6 encapsulation.
